text: The House of Orsini is an Italian noble family. It was one of the most influential princely families in Italy during the Middle Ages and the Renaissance."Orsini", Catholic Encyclopedia; retrieved 2011-11-7. Three popes belonged to the Orsini family: Celestine III (1191–1198, born Gicinto Bobone),"Pope Celestine III", Catholic Encyclopedia; retrieved 2011-11-7. Nicholas III (1277–1280, born Giovanni Gaetani Orsini),"Pope Nicholas III", Catholic Encyclopedia; retrieved 2011-11-7. and Benedict XIII (1724–1730, born Pietro Francesco Orsini)."Pope Benedict XIII", Catholic Encyclopedia; retrieved 2011-11-7. The Orsini family also produced 34 Cardinals of the Roman Church and many other important political and religious people. ==Sources== ==Other websites== * Catholic Encyclopedia: Orsini * Encyclopedia Americana: Orsini Orsini Orsini
title: House of Orsini
